summary: chelsea have made an offer for fc tokyo 's 22-year-old forward yoshinori muto . the japan international will join chelsea 's vitesse arnhem on loan next season if he completes a move to stamford bridge this summer . ogane claims that chelsea 's interest in muto is not connected to the # 200million deal they signed with japanese company yokohama rubber in february .
aspect: Chelsea makes an offer for 22-year-old FC Tokyo forward Yoshinori Muto, who will join Vitesse Arnhem on loan next season if he completes the move this summer. Muto's £200 million sponsorship deal with Yokohama Rubber is unrelated to the offer.
explain: Chelsea offers to sign Japanese forward Yoshinori Muto from FC Tokyo, who will join Vitesse Arnhem on loan next season if the move goes through this summer. The club's interest in Muto is not connected to their previous £200 million sponsorship deal with Yokohama Rubber.
